title: Target
description: Schema for submitting a target gene.

dbxref.title: External identifiers
dbxref.description: Unique identifiers from external resources (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
items.comment: Submit as database name:target name (e.g. HGNC:HMFN0395, GeneID:22809)

target_organism.title: Target organism
target_organism.comment: This property is for targets which don't have any associated genes. This property and the "genes" property are mutually exclusive. See organism.json for available identifiers.

genes.title: Targeted genes
genes.description: List of gene(s) targeted by corresponding assay or antibody.
genes.comment: See gene.json for available identifiers and details.

items.title: Targeted Gene
items.description: A gene targeted by corresponding assay or antibody.
items.comment: See gene.json for available identifiers and details.

modifications.title: Modification to the corresponding gene product.
modifications.description: List of modifications made to the corresponding gene product of this target.
modifications.comment: This property will be used to calculate the proper label of the target. See computed_label property for details about automatic label calculation.

items.title: Modification
items.description: A modification to the gene product.

modification.title: Type of modification
modification.description: One specific modifications listed in the enum.

position.title: Amino acid position
position.description: The numeric position (one based) of modified amino acid in the protein.
position.comment: It worth noting that the first Methionine on newly transcribed peptide is usually cleaved through N-terminal methionine excision (NME). Therefore, this cleaved Methionine will not be taken into account and the amino acid right after it is position 1.

amino_acid_code.title: Modified amino acid
amino_acid_code.description: One letter IUPAC amino acid code.

label.title: Common name with modification
label.description: Common name for the target including post-translational modifications, if any.
label.comment: Submit the common name of the gene with modification (e.g. H3K4me3, eGFP-E2F1, or POLR2AphosphoS2).

investigated_as.title: Target project investigation context
investigated_as.description: The context(s) the target was investigated in
